speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I'm doing okay, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding your account with Global Bank. Before we proceed, could you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you. I see you have an outstanding balance of three hundred and fifty dollars. How would you like to address this?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay two hundred now and the rest next month.

speaker: Agent
text: That works. I'll set up the payment of two hundred dollars today. When would you like to schedule the next payment?

speaker: Customer
text: Let’s say March 15th for the remaining.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect, I have noted that down. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your help, Mark.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
